QuestData.Title: Emergent Sea Weeds
QuestData.Description:
There is a special kind of kelp that only grows near the vents.
Our healers use these to help treat our friends in Newhome.
My kind don't have much of a chance down there, but you do!
Gather up some of the vent kelp sprouts in the Dragon's Teeth Basin and bring them to Nevin.
